frontmatter.title: Using Netlify CMS to manage my blog posts
frontmatter.description: Netlify CMS is a single-page React application which acts as a wrapper for our Git Workflow to provide a simple and friendly User Interface (UI).

frontmatter.title: Styled Components
frontmatter.description: As my first post I decided to praise the use of styled-components library in ReactJS applications and show how your front end projects will become more organized and easy to develop with its use.
